before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"3q3u6","text":"For initial experiments, the user must titrate primary and secondary reagents so that staining with the secondary antibody alone yields no background while staining with primary and secondary antibodies yields strong, specific staining.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f1s7f","text":"Take care to ensure that slides do not dry out by incubating with sufficient volumes and/or in a humidified chamber (such as 926301).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":125,"length":6,"style":"UNDERLINE"}],"entityRanges":[{"offset":125,"length":6,"key":0}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"https://www.biolegend.com/humidity-chamber-plus-11211.html"}}}}
warning:
Formalin is a suspect carcinogen. It can cause eye, skin, and respiratory tract irritation. It should be handled in a hood.

 

DAB is a suspect carcinogen. Handle with care. Wear gloves, lab coat and eye protection.

steps.data:
{"blocks":[{"key":"351u6","text":"Fix freshly dissected tissue (<3mm thick) with 10% formalin or other fixatives for 24-48\u00a0h at room temperature.\u00a0","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b34c4","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"885ec","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"19378","duration":"86400","label":"","guid":"66D789CC258142D38CB530CA95E484D2"}},{"type":"notes","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":"

(Caution: Formalin is a suspect carcinogen. It can cause eye, skin, and respiratory tract irritation. It should be handled in a hood.)<\/p>"}],"guid":"DD60965EE06C4AD585019DE35DB5B8F6","id":664198,"previous_id":null,"previous_guid":null,"section":"Prepare formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue sections"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"badqm","text":"Rinse the tissue with running tap water for 1 h.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5hkts","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"19379","duration":"3600","label":"","guid":"44B2B6FB2A174CFDAA27A255657FC988"}}]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"erggi","text":"Dehydrate the tissue through 70%, 80%, 95% alcohol, 45 min each, followed by 3 changes of 100% alcohol, 1 hour each.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"e8pa7","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"ccvov","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"38os7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"19380","duration":"2700","label":"","guid":"850B9D5F87D64419BDA199546C3D72BF"}},{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"8C428BC0B79D11E881CF73F8D44CEFD0","duration":3600,"label":"","step_guid":"6FABF15619F04C3193EA6B07D9F740DB"}}],"guid":"6FABF15619F04C3193EA6B07D9F740DB","id":664200,"previous_id":664199,"previous_guid":"7A51BA4392744FDD9BA906A763C5FEB8","section":"Prepare formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue sections"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cuiqa","text":"Clear the tissue through 2 changes of xylene, 1 hour each.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ernsj","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"19381","duration":"3600","label":"","guid":"FA62D2BEF30944DB9CBFE695788AD90A"}}],"guid":"1A07360D9E5E4669A3407DE2D5F76546","id":664201,"previous_id":664231,"previous_guid":"6FABF15619F04C3193EA6B07D9F740DB","section":"Prepare formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue sections"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"danaf","text":"Immerse the tissue in 3 changes of paraffin, 1 hour each.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a075m","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"19382","duration":"3600","label":"","guid":"837EFBC4DE894E4CB6DCF739A93133A4"}}],"guid":"4A6E212FD0CA43FE9AB3F914328820B5","id":664202,"previous_id":664232,"previous_guid":"1A07360D9E5E4669A3407DE2D5F76546","section":"Prepare formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue sections"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4vvu8","text":"Section the paraffin-embedded tissue block at 5-8\u00b5m thickness on a microtome and float in a 40\u00b0C water bath containing distilled water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bek0a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"1740D0B2DB3849B0ACAC79EDA74A0CEA","id":664203,"previous_id":664234,"previous_guid":"C2AFA6C0B79D11E881CF73F8D44CEFD0","section":"Prepare formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue sections"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aq4jk","text":"Transfer the sections onto glass slides suitable for immunohistochemistry (e.g. Superfrost Plus). Allow the slides to dry overnight and store slides at room temperature until ready for use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"0E480D485B6547D59BBF2CAB943BB089","id":664204,"previous_id":664203,"previous_guid":"1740D0B2DB3849B0ACAC79EDA74A0CEA","section":"Prepare formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue sections"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fd63e","text":"Deparaffinize slides in 2 changes of xylene, 5 min each.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"eomo7","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"19384","duration":"300","label":"","guid":"E0C6E7B1C010425D9232C45D3F2EDF85"}}],"guid":"56D1F8E19AD040B8AC3B2EE8D470687D","id":664206,"previous_id":664205,"previous_guid":"965C6F9CE85A4C6E871E5CC51C54BBE7","section":"Immunostain formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue sections"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2at6k","text":"Drain off the blocking buffer from the slides.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"27946B0151A448AB95768600D94A6F39","id":664207,"previous_id":664213,"previous_guid":"AD501FBA3E454546BC77C58A2EAACAD6","section":"Immunostain formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue sections"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"anjdp","text":"Block endogenous peroxidase activity by incubating sections in 3% H2O2 solution in methanol at room temperature for 10 min to block endogenous peroxidase activity.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":67,"length":1,"style":"sub"},{"offset":69,"length":1,"style":"sub"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bufft","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"19386","duration":"600","label":"","guid":"B95A6A5CBCE245BEAD616785026F8850"}}],"guid":"C869960D64D04A76B14D52DC0A3CED88","id":664209,"previous_id":664239,"previous_guid":"56D1F8E19AD040B8AC3B2EE8D470687D","section":"Immunostain formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue sections"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ftqge","text":"Rinse in 300ml of PBS for 2 changes, 5 min each.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ai2g2","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"d7nk6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"0F8A2E70B79E11E881CF73F8D44CEFD0","duration":300,"label":"","step_guid":"8B95533D20724F5DA7C5D10028101FEF"}}],"guid":"8B95533D20724F5DA7C5D10028101FEF","id":664210,"previous_id":664209,"previous_guid":"C869960D64D04A76B14D52DC0A3CED88","section":"Immunostain formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue sections"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9p5d2","text":"Optional: Perform antigen retrieval to unmask the antigenic epitope. The most commonly used antigen retrieval is a citrate buffer method. Arrange the slides in a staining container. Pour 300ml of 10mM citrate buffer, pH 6.0 into the staining container and incubate it at 95-100\u00b0C for 10 min (optimal incubation time should be determined by user). Remove the staining container to room temperature and allow the slides to cool for 20 min.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":10,"style":"italic"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"127AF0234A7A484FB153038F9923ADBA","id":664211,"previous_id":664240,"previous_guid":"8B95533D20724F5DA7C5D10028101FEF","section":"Immunostain formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue sections"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a5tgi","text":"Rinse slides in 300ml PBS for 2 changes, 5 min each.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"F7B3B7238FFD4D5BBD98896A24D2E5FA","id":664212,"previous_id":664211,"previous_guid":"127AF0234A7A484FB153038F9923ADBA","section":"Immunostain formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue sections"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"59g9i","text":"Optional: Add 100\u00b5l blocking buffer (e.g. 10% fetal bovine serum in PBS) onto the sections of the slides and incubate in a humidified chamber at room temperature for 1 hour. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":10,"style":"italic"}],"entityRanges":[{"offset":173,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"62gi5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"2C7CEAE0B79E11E881CF73F8D44CEFD0","duration":3600,"label":"","step_guid":"AD501FBA3E454546BC77C58A2EAACAD6"}}],"guid":"AD501FBA3E454546BC77C58A2EAACAD6","id":664213,"previous_id":664241,"previous_guid":"F7B3B7238FFD4D5BBD98896A24D2E5FA","section":"Immunostain formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue sections"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6oc7l","text":"Apply 100\u00b5l appropriately diluted primary antibody (in antibody dilution buffer, e.g. 0.5% bovine serum albumin in PBS) to the sections on the slides and incubate in a humidified chamber at room temperature for 1 hour.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":219,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"fqm0s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"3B83A880B79E11E881CF73F8D44CEFD0","duration":3600,"label":"","step_guid":"799411ED60AA452E8D9919546FE02A1F"}}],"guid":"799411ED60AA452E8D9919546FE02A1F","id":664214,"previous_id":664207,"previous_guid":"27946B0151A448AB95768600D94A6F39","section":"Immunostain formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue sections"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4q2ne","text":"Apply 100\u00b5l appropriately diluted biotinylated secondary antibody (using the antibody dilution buffer) to the sections on the slides and incubate in a humidified chamber at room temperature for 30 min.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":202,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"c3k07","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"5119A0F0B79E11E881CF73F8D44CEFD0","duration":1800,"label":"","step_guid":"4B17DD8A9C96452DAD0574EAEC9D08F2"}}],"guid":"4B17DD8A9C96452DAD0574EAEC9D08F2","id":664216,"previous_id":664242,"previous_guid":"F63BD59EE3C848E186D1BC90D759DF5A","section":"Immunostain formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue sections"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eibss","text":"Wash slides in 300ml PBS for 2 changes, 5 min each. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":51,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"902qj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":0,"guid":"58F66A60B79E11E881CF73F8D44CEFD0","duration":300,"label":"","step_guid":"0F3D89C60BA749B9890FCF890BE5C716"}}],"guid":"0F3D89C60BA749B9890FCF890BE5C716","id":664217,"previous_id":664216,"previous_guid":"4B17DD8A9C96452DAD0574EAEC9D08F2","section":"Immunostain formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue sections"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2l5nm","text":"Apply 100\u00b5l appropriately diluted Sav-HRP conjugates (using the antibody dilution buffer) to the sections on the slides and incubate in a humidified chamber at room temperature for 30 min (keep protected from light).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fr55p","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"19394","duration":"1800","label":"","guid":"71E8C64D7A0F43469167ABABA9DDEDDE"}}],"guid":"231F171E733044BCBDF72724C52F7F52","id":664218,"previous_id":664243,"previous_guid":"0F3D89C60BA749B9890FCF890BE5C716","section":"Immunostain formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue sections"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7bqpf","text":"Wash slides in 300ml PBS for 2 changes, 5 min each.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3vrm7","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"19395","duration":"300","label":"","guid":"54BCCFB8DF33489FA5D87A01276954E1"}}],"guid":"24D6583FEAE04D7D8CA9E642E0F25AF4","id":664219,"previous_id":664218,"previous_guid":"231F171E733044BCBDF72724C52F7F52","section":"Immunostain formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue sections"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"buev7","text":"Apply 100 \u00b5l DAB substrate solution (freshly made just before use: 0.05% DAB - 0.015%\u00a0H2O2 in PBS) to the sections on the slides to reveal the color of antibody staining. Allow\u00a0the color development for < 5 min until the desired color intensity is reached.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":87,"length":1,"style":"sub"},{"offset":89,"length":1,"style":"sub"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ar74f","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"notes","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":"

(Caution: DAB is a suspect carcinogen. Handle with care. Wear gloves, lab coat and eye protection.)<\/p>"}],"guid":"520C95BAB4EA4C888116BFF9CC755D13","id":664220,"previous_id":664244,"previous_guid":"24D6583FEAE04D7D8CA9E642E0F25AF4","section":"Immunostain formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue sections"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"15tpn","text":"Wash slides in 300ml PBS for 2 changes, 5 min each.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"41bs1","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"19396","duration":"120","label":"","guid":"6A773D3785A54B6EA7D6A5ABF1044042"}}],"guid":"E896EF5A449F4DD6A25E758CEEA37851","id":664221,"previous_id":664220,"previous_guid":"520C95BAB4EA4C888116BFF9CC755D13","section":"Immunostain formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue sections"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"91he4","text":"Optional: Counterstain slides by immersing sides in Hematoxylin (e.g. Gill's Hematoxylin) for 1-2 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":10,"style":"italic"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1sbrm","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"19397","duration":120,"label":"","guid":"EA20A987D3C54FD684D9935F64672E09"}}],"guid":"315747B290F94838A95376A4C98A6CA4","id":664222,"previous_id":664246,"previous_guid":"E896EF5A449F4DD6A25E758CEEA37851","section":"Immunostain formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue sections"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6n8k1","text":"Rinse the slides in running tap water for > 15 min. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"jf8l","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"19398","duration":"900","label":"","guid":"319CC43553344A56860E0149CD251F52"}}]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e80sn","text":"Clear the tissue slides in 3 changes of xylene and coverslip using mounting solution (e.g. Permount). The mounted slides can be stored at room temperature permanently.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b9esh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"CC3EFE745BDB413AA3EE8807B3919A9A","id":664225,"previous_id":664249,"previous_guid":"C9B7B6EE18CF493BBB6803978EA66F1D","section":"Immunostain formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue sections"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e831c","text":"Observe the color of the antibody staining in the tissue sections under microscopy.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[]}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bdv0d","text":"Wash the slides in 300ml PBS for 2 changes 5 min each.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5hdvu","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":"19415","duration":"300","label":"","guid":"2634A4C9C8D348BFAA53BBB5F6896072"}}],"guid":"F63BD59EE3C848E186D1BC90D759DF5A","id":664242,"previous_id":664215,"previous_guid":"799411ED60AA452E8D9919546FE02A1F","section":"Immunostain formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue sections"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"75dju","text":"Dehydrate the tissue slides through 4 changes of alcohol (95%, 95%, 100% and 100%), 5 min each. {"blocks":[{"key":"9p6t3","text":" Embed the tissue in a paraffin block. The paraffin tissue block can be stored at room temperature for years.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bul8p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5te5m","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bvo3c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cp1gv","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"C2AFA6C0B79D11E881CF73F8D44CEFD0","id":664252,"previous_guid":"4A6E212FD0CA43FE9AB3F914328820B5","section":"Prepare formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue sections"}
